attributes.action: bring forward legislation to raise the minimum age to become an MP to 35 so they have some idea of what it's like to live in the real world first
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
More and more MPs are career politicians only ever having done jobs related to politics, and have no real insight of what the issues and problems that the vast majority of people face everyday.
If the minimum age was raised to 35 then hopefully most would gain a more rounded experience of the 'real world' and make far better law makers.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
